experiences.description:
Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of
global design.
Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative
application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing
strategy and material R&D as well.
Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas
such as renewable energy house, high-speed train,  electric vehicle,  mobile
computing etc.
experiences.title: Design Manager

experiences.description:
Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint
venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time.
Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics,
and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in
Greater China and SEA .
Midea
experiences.title: Senior Design Consultant

experiences.description:
of in-house industrial designer in China,  providing product
design service to Midea and other benefit-conflict free external clients.  Beside
using the very old school design techniques of hand sketching, hand rendering
and hand made prototypes, we were the pioneers of adopting contemporary
design techniques, such 2D rendering, 3D modeling and 3D printing back then.
As the major driver, to help import user-centric approach into design process,
including adoption  of  user research and UX/UI design  .
experiences.title: lead designer
